hero.title: Transform Your Vehicle
hero.subtitle: Premium vehicle wraps and paint protection services

about.title: About Us
about.content: Dynamic Auto Wraps is a single-owner operation led by Donnie Avant, bringing over 15 years of experience in the automotive industry. Every vehicle receives personal attention and expert care.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Vehicle?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to schedule a consultation and get a free quote for your vehicle wrap, paint protection, or detailing project.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive range of vehicle customization and protection services to transform and preserve your vehicle.

fullWraps.title: Full Vehicle Wraps
fullWraps.description: Transform your vehicle with a complete color change or custom design wrap that covers the entire exterior, personally installed by our founder.

partialWraps.title: Partial Wraps
partialWraps.description: Add accents or highlight specific areas of your vehicle with partial wraps that create a unique look.

ppf.title: Paint Protection Film
ppf.description: Protect your vehicle's paint from scratches, chips, and environmental damage with our high-quality PPF.

signage.title: Business Signage
signage.description: Boost your brand visibility with custom business signage, vehicle graphics, and storefront solutions.

detailing.title: Auto Detailing
detailing.description: Keep your vehicle looking its best with our professional detailing services, from basic wash to full detail.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2021, Dynamic Auto Wraps began with a simple mission: to provide elite vehicle transformation services with uncompromising quality and customer care.
